page.title: 18THE MOOT HALL
page.content: The slates on the roof are really small.The house is on the corner of Albany Gardens and the whole house is leaning to one side.The house was built in 1490.Moot Hall was originally in Chelmsford where it was pulled down brick by brick and later put up brick by brick in Clacton.Inside Moot Hall there are suits of armour and old pictures.It is extremely detailed on the outside as well as the inside. Moot Hall was brought to Clacton by horse and wagon,it was orginally built in the Horstead place,Bury St Edmunds, sixty one years ago.
